verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I hae' friends, they buy me whisky Bonnie friends they call my name But if I should get too drunk for walkin' Where's the man that would carry me hame

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: And if I be drunk in the Isla Waters Through the Thistlewood I must hame If I be drunk in the Isla Waters My wee doggie would find me in the Isla Stream

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: All the day I bless that water Aye she's bricht an' clear to see But after hours o' ale hoose laughter Dark an' still she waits for me

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Like the fisher's line that's broken Leaves the salmon tae the swell Many's the nicht you've had me soakin' Part tae break the lyer's hell

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: All my days I've lived tae court her Bauden bonny fine stuff I've seen But should I droun in yuir water My wee doggie would find me in the Isla Stream
